meanings.definition: To give or grant (something) to someone
meanings.sent1: She bestrows kindness to all her friends.
meanings.sent2: The teacher bestrows knowledge upon her students.
meanings.sent3: He bestrows compliments like confetti at a party.
meanings.sent4: The sun bestrows its golden rays across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The generous queen bestrows gifts to her subjects.

meanings.definition: To distribute or dispense (something) to others
meanings.sent1: The charity bestrows food to the needy every week.
meanings.sent2: The postman bestrows letters to every house on the street.
meanings.sent3: The magician bestrows magic tricks to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: The wind bestrows leaves across the yard in autumn.
meanings.sent5: The farmer bestrows seeds in the freshly plowed field.
